# Simulation Population

Simulation einer Population.

```{r}
data <- rnorm_multi(
  n = 200, 
  mu = c(0, 45, 180),
  sd = c(3, 5, 5),
  r = c(0.5, 0.5, 0.25), 
  varnames = c("health", "age", "heigth"),
  empirical = FALSE
  )
```
